QuestData.Title: For the Ward!
QuestData.Description:
We can finally restore the wards. We have suffered great losses, but our work must be completed.
$p, we need your help once more. Bring each keystone to its rightful place in order to make the wards whole again.
Once that is done, come back, so we can activate the console and restore order in the reservoir.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Missing Keystones to repair the reservoir wards, then activate the console.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $p. The wards have been restored, and Tyrhold Reservoir is once again protected. Thank you for all you have done. Thaldraszus owes you a great debt.
